duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, direct, and control the execution of construction contracts for heavy industrial (utility power plant) customers to meet schedule, cost, quality, and safety objectives for large multi-million-dollar projects.
Review UCC proposals and contract requirements to ensure that construction costs are accurately estimated to secure the Customer’s business while meeting UCC’s profit target.
Provide timely, accurate, concise written and verbal communication on the status of the contract to the Customer and the UCC Management and project team.
Secure future business opportunities by maintaining excellent Customer relationships.
Prepare and implement site-specific Health and Safety Management Plans.
Identify improvements to UCC construction processes and workflows to improve efficiency, reduce errors, and provide a best-practice standard for future construction work.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, Construction Management, Project Management or Business (Master's preferred)
